Service Details: Offers a full pick-up and delivery commercial laundry service * cleans linens and household items such as sheets/pillowcases, towels, rugs, table cloths, pillows, blankets, duvets, quilts and mattress pads * cleans coats, uniforms and work clothing, purses, bags and back packs, leather shoes and boots, wedding dresses * cleans patio and outdoor items such as cushions, pillows, boat covers, life jackets, wetsuits, tents, sleeping bags, single foam camping mattresses, and tarps * cleans sports equipment such as uniforms, pads, guards, gloves, socks, boot liners, helmets, skates, jocks, skiing/boarding/snowmobile jackets and pants * cleans horseback riding blankets and accessories
